Uses of Class
gametools.Area

    • Uses of Area in gametools

      Subclasses of Area in gametools 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Sprite
      Used to represent game objects or characters.
      Fields in gametools declared as Area 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Area Area.UNDEFINED_AREA
      An empty area to represent a non existent or undefined object.
      Methods in gametools that return Area 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Area Tools.ar(Position pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      The short form notation for creating an area.
      static Area Tools.ar(Position tl, Position br)
      Converts two points to an area object going through those positions.
      static Area Game.getArea() 
      Area Sprite.getArea()
      Returns the sprite converted to an area object.
      Area Sprite.getImageArea()
      Returns the full area of the rotated image.
      Area Sprite.getMovementArea()
      Returns the area in which the sprite is allowed to move with the movement commands.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Area 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new array list.
      java.util.List<Sprite> SpriteGroup.getAllWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the object (using the specified collision method) as a new array list.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Area obj)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the specified object.
      Sprite SpriteGroup.getFirstWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns the first sprite (in the group's default order) that is colliding with the object using the specified collision method.
      SpriteGroup SpriteGroup.getGroupWithin(Area obj)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      SpriteGroup SpriteGroup.getGroupWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Returns all sprites from the group that are colliding with the specified object as a new sprite group.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Area obj)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and touch collision as the collision testing method.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Checks if the object is colliding with another object or area using rectangular collision and a custom collision flag.
      void Sprite.lockMovementArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprite can move inside.
      void SpriteGroup.removeAllWithin(Area obj)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object.
      void SpriteGroup.removeAllWithin(Area obj, int method)
      Removes all sprites that are colliding with the specified object using a custom collision testing method.
      void Area.setArea(Area area)
      Copies over the position and dimensions from the specified area.
      void SpriteGroup.setRemoveArea(Area area)
      Defines the area the sprites can move inside.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Area 
      Constructor and Description
      Area(Area area)
      Creates an area and copies over the properties from the specified object.
